com.kakao.auth.authorization.accesstoken

Interface AccessToken

  • package com.kakao.auth.authorization.accesstoken
public interface AccessToken
    Stores access token and refresh token data used by Kakao API.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  AccessToken.Factory
      Factory class for instantiating Access token

    • Method Summary

      Methods
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Date accessTokenExpiresAt()
      Get expire time for access token
      abstract void clearAccessToken()
      Clear access token and its expire time.
      abstract void clearRefreshToken()
      Clear refresh token and its expire time.
      abstract String getAccessToken()
      Get access token.
      abstract String getRefreshToken()
      Get refresh token.
      abstract int getRemainingExpireTime()
      Get remaining expire time for access token in millisceonds
      abstract boolean hasValidAccessToken()
      check if access token is valid or not by its expiration time.
      abstract boolean hasValidRefreshToken()
      Check if refresh token is valid or not by its expiration time.
      abstract Date refreshTokenExpiresAt()
      Get expire time for refresh token
      abstract void updateAccessToken(AccessToken accessToken)
      Update global access token with the given one (which could just be POJO).

      • int getRemainingExpireTime()
        Get remaining expire time for access token in millisceonds
        Returns:
        Remaining expire time for access token in milliseconds
      • boolean hasValidAccessToken()
        check if access token is valid or not by its expiration time.
        Returns:
        true if valid, false otherwise.
      • boolean hasValidRefreshToken()
        Check if refresh token is valid or not by its expiration time.
        Returns:
        true if there is a valid refresh token, false otherwise.

        Get expire time for refresh token
        Returns:
        Expire time for refresh token as Date object
